list.name: Changes
list.comment:
"🔐 Added user authentication & restructured code for better readability
- Implemented a login system requiring users to authenticate before accessing the password manager. - Added a registration feature allowing new users to create an account if no database exists. - Refactored code for improved readability and maintainability. - Enhanced security by validating user credentials before accessing stored passwords. - Optimized file handling to prevent data corruption."
